exchange_account_update_header: You can add an email account to your solution. It will be included in your monthly bill.
exchange_account_update_accountType_tool: Email Pro: Get 10GB of storage, POP, IMAP and SMTP protocols. Exchange: Get 50GB of storage, MAPI and ActiveSync protocols.
exchange_account_update_emailAddress_hin: The local part of your email address (the text before the '@') must follow these guidelines:
must begin and end with a letter or number
special characters cannot be placed side by side
exchange_account_update_emailAddress_hid: Hide the address in the directory
exchange_account_update_contact_phone_he: Please enter a phone number in international format (00xx etc.).
exchange_account_update_password_hint_si: This field must be at least {0} characters long.
exchange_account_update_password_hint_co: For security reasons, this field must meet the following criteria:
Must not contain the display name or the name of the Exchange 2010 account (not case-sensitive).
Must contain elements from three of the following four categories:
exchange_account_update_field_error_does: This field does not meet the complexity requirements.
exchange_account_update_emailAddress_err: An account with this email address already exists.
exchange_account_update_submit_success: The {0} account has been created. You will be able to use it in a few minutes.
exchange_ACTION_update_account_legal_tit: I accept the terms of use
exchange_ACTION_update_account_legal_war: I accept that OVHcloud will set up the service immediately on validating my order, and I therefore explicitly renounce my right of retraction under the provisions of Article L.121-21-8 of the French consumer code.
exchange_ACTION_update_no_domains:
You haven't added a domain yet, or it still hasn't been validated.
You must first add a domain and wait for validation before you can create an Exchange account.
exchange_ACTION_update_account_option_fa: An error has occurred loading your domains.
exchange_ACTION_update_account_fetchingA: An error has occurred loading the options for creating an Exchange account.
exchange_ACTION_update_account_error_mes: An error has occurred creating the Exchange account: {{message}}
